content.rendered: Fredrik Ringquist is a partner in Mannheimer Swartling’s Dispute Resolution practice group. He has approximately 20 years’ experience of dispute resolution involving a wide range of dispute resolution mechanisms, including litigation, arbitration, expert determinations as well as mediation and other forms of negotiation-based procedures. He provides advice during all stages of disputes – from initial case assessments to enforcement proceedings. Fredrik, who has spent more than a decade of his legal career outside of Sweden, has particular expertise in complex cross-border disputes, involving proceedings in multiple jurisdictions, the application of foreign laws as well as international asset tracing and enforcement. In addition to his counsel work, Fredrik acts as arbitrator and holds leadership positions in various industry associations, including the Executive Committee of the Swedish Arbitration Association.
